nodes.text: Brug D'Shar was a male Sakiyan who worked as an aide-de-camp to Senior Counselor Westa Impeveri. During the time of the Clone Wars, D'Shar participated in a discussion on the nature of the benefits and problems caused to the planet Cularin by the world's platform cities. During the debate, D'Shar argued that the platform cities were beneficial to the economy of Cularin.
